cards.title: Pulse Cannon
powers: This hero deals 1 Target 3 Sonic Damage.
body: If this is not owned by a hero, that hero's player may skip their play phase and discard a card. If they do, move this card to their play area and they gain ownership of this card for the rest of the game.

At the end of the Environment turn, if this is not owned by a Hero, the Villain Target with the Highest HP deals the Hero Target with the Highest HP 3 Sonic Damage, increased by 3 for each Ammo card next to this card. Then, destroy each Ammo card next to this card.
[i](A card's power can be used by a hero who owns the card.)[/i]
